Dear Prof. Barak-Gorodetsky,
I am writing to request that the University of Haifa transfer $72,555 to the Schusterman Center for Israel Studies at Brandeis University. These funds will be designated to cover expenses of the University of Haifa/Ruderman Program's 2024 summer trip to Boston and New York, which Brandeis hosted in June 2024.
